title: NATO ALPHABET
guide:
### Radio Spelling
| A | **Alpha** | N | **November** |
| B | **Bravo** | O | **Oscar** |
| C | **Charlie** | P | **Papa** |
| D | **Delta** | Q | **Quebec** |
| E | **Echo** | R | **Romeo** |
| F | **Foxtrot** | S | **Sierra** |
| G | **Golf** | T | **Tango** |
| H | **Hotel** | U | **Uniform** |
| I | **India** | V | **Victor** |
| J | **Juliett** | W | **Whiskey** |
| K | **Kilo** | X | **X-ray** |
| L | **Lima** | Y | **Yankee** |
| M | **Mike** | Z | **Zulu** |

*Note:* 9 is "Niner".
